Package org.abstractica.javacsg

package org.abstractica.javacsg
  • Class
    Description
    Angle
    Provides an immutable angle measurement accessible in multiple units.
    Geometry
    Represents a general immutable geometric entity.
    Geometry2D
    Represents an immutable two-dimensional geometric entity.
    Geometry3D
    Represents an immutable three-dimensional geometric entity.
    JavaCSG
    Provides a comprehensive set of immutable geometric modeling operations for both 2D and 3D.
    JavaCSGFactory
    A factory class for creating JavaCSG instances configured in various ways.
    Polar2D
    Represents an immutable vector in two-dimensional space using polar coordinates.
    Transform2D
    This interface represents an immutable 2D transformation.
    Transform3D
    This interface represents an immutable 3D transformation.
    Vector2D
    Represents an immutable two-dimensional vector defined by x and y components.
    Vector3D
    Represents an immutable three-dimensional vector defined by x, y, and z components.
